snippet.title: NINJA KATO 2
snippet.description:
【Second in the Ninja Kato series!】

 A side-scrolling 2D action game.
After completing his training in "NINJA KATO 1," the robot ninja Kato takes on the next challenge.

Released on January 22, 2024.

Sold on Steam, Epic Games, and Google Play!

●Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2715230/NINJA_KATO_2/
●Epic Games
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/ninja-kato-2-37fa87?lang=en-US
●Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.KIBODO.NINJAKATO2
